html: Jacob. Thus the converts address God, (Haydock) or the prophet give the reasons of the subversion of the ten tribes.—Filled. Consecrated as priests.—Children. Imitating idolatrous nations, (Calmet) and marrying with them, (Calmet; Septuagint; Theodoret) or even giving way to unnatural sins. (St. Jerome) (Menochius)— The Jews were not utterly cast off till they had put Christ to death. His Church shall never perish. (Worthington)
